comment: Jonteinspain We voted to leave the EU and should have gone within months. May has Kept us in for two and a half years and now has negotiated even more time in this EU prison. This is taking the piss. No one is this incompetent. Her EU conspiracy is working well but not for the people.
amr:
# ::snt Jonteinspain We voted to leave the EU and should have gone within months. May has Kept us in for two and a half years and now has negotiated even more time in this EU prison. This is taking the piss. No one is this incompetent. Her EU conspiracy is working well but not for the people.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (v / vote-01
                        :ARG0 (w / we)
                        :ARG1 (l / leave-11
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (o / organization
                                    :name (n / name
                                          :op1 "EU"))))
                  :op2 (r / recommend-01
                        :ARG1 (g / go-02
                              :ARG0 w
                              :time (a2 / after
                                    :quant (u / up-to
                                          :op1 (m2 / multiple
                                                :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                                                      :quant 1
                                                      :unit (m3 / month))))))))
            :ARG2 (p / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Jonteinspain")))
      :snt2 (a3 / and
            :op1 (k / Kept-in-05
                  :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "May"))
                  :ARG1 (w2 / we)
                  :duration (t2 / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 2.5
                        :unit (y / year)))
            :op2 (n4 / negotiate-01
                  :ARG0 g2
                  :ARG2 (t3 / time
                        :mod (m4 / more
                              :mod (e / even)))
                  :time (n5 / now)
                  :location (p2 / prison
                        :mod o
                        :mod (t4 / this))))
      :snt3 (t5 / take-01
            :ARG0 (t6 / this)
            :ARG1 (p3 / piss))
      :snt4 (c / competent-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (n6 / no-one)
            :mod (t7 / this))
      :snt5 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (w3 / work-09
                  :ARG1 (c3 / conspiracy
                        :poss (s2 / she))
                  :ARG1-of (w4 / well-09))
            :ARG2 (w5 / work-09
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 c3
                  :ARG2 (p4 / person))))

comment: Avoid using sexually vulgar terms when speaking of the female gender.
amr:
# ::snt Avoid using sexually vulgar terms when speaking of the female gender.
(a / avoid-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (y / you)
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (t / term
                  :mod (v / vulgar
                        :mod (s / sexual)))
            :time (s2 / speak-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (g / gender
                        :mod (f / female)))))

comment: No need to use hateful language regarding women to express political opinion.
amr:

(n / need-01
      :polarity -
      :ARG1 (u / use-01
            :ARG1 (l / language
                  :ARG0-of (h / hate-01)
                  :topic (w / woman))
            :ARG2 (e / express-01

                  :ARG1 (o / opine-01
